about_the_game:
Warlord Rhapsody is a multiplayer, turn-based strategy game for 2-6 players, where each commander leads a unique faction with distinct abilities. Battle across procedurally generated worlds, seize key tactical points, and crush the enemy base to claim victory!

In this hex-based battlefield, every unit is under your direct control. Will you launch bold offensives, set up calculated ambushes, or overwhelm your foes with sheer numbers? With up to unique 30 units per faction, the possibilities are endless—your strategy shapes your fate.

Features

  • Unique Factions: Start with 2 distinct factions, each offering unique gameplay styles and strategies, with plans to expand to 9 factions in future updates.

  • Heroes: Every faction boasts 3 powerful heroes, each with game-changing abilities that can turn the tide of battle and provide strategic depth.

  • Procedurally Generated Worlds: Battle across dozens of procedurally generated scenarios, ensuring no two matches are ever the same.

  • 2 Exciting Game Modes: Choose between Siege, where you conquer tactical points to destroy your enemy’s base, or Armies, a pure war of attrition where two armies collide head-on.

About us

We’re two brothers from Spain with one simple goal: to create games we’d love to play ourselves. Warlord Rhapsody is the result of hundreds of hours spent fantasizing and daydreaming about strategy games, and we hope to share that same passion and excitement with our players.
